test: It should return foods that match the query 'pizza'
It should return foods for page 1 with pageSize 10
It should return foods with prep time between 10 and 60 minutes
It should return foods with quality >= 3
It should return foods where haveMade is true
It should return foods with difficulty 'medium'
It should return foods with hashtags 'healthy' and 'quick'
It should return foods sorted by prep time in ascending order
It should return foods sorted by quality in descending order

test.message: It does not depend on any filter options
